T02D1727:93a-1: a'arya au gra t'a ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1727:93a-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1727:93a-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1727:93a-5: sgrol ma srid pa gsum sgrol au gra t'a ra la btud de //
T02D1727:93a-6: padma'i man ngag ji bzhin de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod //
T02D1727:93a-7: ling ga gcig dang de bzhin dur khrod yang na khang pa stong par ni //
T02D1727:93a-8: gnas der srid gsum grol ba'i rig ma rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub //
T02D1727:93a-9: 'jam par gyur pa'i byis pa'i ro'am yang na 'jam pa yi //
T02D1727:93a-10: stan la sogs la mnyam gnas dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1727:93a-11: thog mar kha gdong dag par rab byas gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02D1727:93a-12: mdun gyi nam mkha' bla ma mchod la sdig pa bshags pa dang //
T02D1727:93a-13: rjes su yi rang bsod nams yongs bsngo lam ni rab tu bsten //
T02D1727:93a-14: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rjes su dran par byang chub sems ni bskyed //
T02D1727:93a-15: skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje gsum ni
T02D1727:93a-16: bde mnyam bzhag / de ni gnas gsum bsam bya
T02D1727:93a-18: srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni //
T02D1727:93a-19: khams gsum mtha' dag bsdus nas stong pa nyid du bsam par bya //
T02D1727:93a-20: de nas sh'u n+ya t'a sogs rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gsang sngags brjod //
T02D1727:93a-21: de nas nam mkha' aa yig las byung chu skyes dmar po bsam //
T02D1727:93a-22: slar yang de steng t'am yig las ni padma'i steng bsam bya //
T02D1727:93b-0: de dbus @93b h'um yig mthon mthing dag dang mtshungs pa bsams nas ni //
T02D1727:93b-1: h'um yig de las skyes pa'i gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan pa //
T02D1727:93b-2: gri gug yongs gyur bdag nyid sgrol ma mtshungs par bsgom pa ni /
T02D1727:93b-3: g-yon brkyang zhabs can mi bzad mgo bo'i phred pa rab tu 'phyad //
T02D1727:93b-4: chu skyes sngon po rnam par brgyan cing thung zhing
T02D1727:93b-5: lto 'phyang 'jigs byed ma / bzang mo zhal gcig
T02D1727:93b-6: phyag bzhi spyan gsum gad rgyangs 'od dang ldan //
T02D1727:93b-7: rab tu dgyes shing ro mnan klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1727:93b-8: dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan can stag gi pags pa rked la bsnams //
T02D1727:93b-9: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun tshogs phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1727:93b-10: ljags ni rab 'khyug mche ba gcig sa shing 'jigs chen 'jigs byed ma //
T02D1727:93b-11: phyag g-yas ral gri gri gug g-yon na autpala thod pa bsnams //
T02D1727:93b-12: ral gcig dmar ser gyen brdzes mi bskyod pa yis dbu brgyan ma //
T02D1727:93b-13: bsgoms pas stobs ni rab rdzogs rnal 'byor snyan dngags chen por 'gyur //
T02D1727:93b-14: gal te blun rmongs gyur kyang bsgom pa'i rol 'bad byed na //
T02D1727:93b-15: bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig gis 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid thob par 'gyur //
T02D1727:93b-16: snying gar yig gsum sngags chen rab bkod phat yig mtha' ru'o //
T02D1727:93b-17: yang dag 'od zer lnga ldan mi shes bud shing
T02D1727:93b-18: rab tu bsreg / rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rjes 'brang
T02D1727:93b-19: de nyid btu ba'i cho ga brjod //
T02D1727:93b-20: dang por sa yi pha rol dbyangs yig bzhi bas rnam brgyan cing //
T02D1727:93b-21: ra yis bzhon zhing 'od 'phros zla ba'i thig le yang dag ldan //
T02D1727:93b-22: de bzhin bzhi pas ta yig brgyan te rnam par yang dag sbyin //
T02D1727:93b-23: slar yang ham yig las sbyor yang dag au yig ring por ldan //
T02D1727:93b-24: phad yig de nas sbyin zhing yongs rdzogs sgrub pa'i sngags nyid do //
T02D1727:93b-25: ral gri'i gnas su mkhas pas mi mgo'i phreng ba rnam par bsam //
T02D1727:93b-26: yang dag sngags mchog bzla zhing spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1727:93b-27: brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas bdag nyid mkhas shing snyan dngags tshe //
T02D1727:93b-28: rab tu bsgom la goms pas de nyid the tshom med par 'grub //
T02D1727:94a-0: h'um gi yi ge las byung @94a * //
T02D1727:94a-1: sngo zhing sbom thung ral ba'i thor tshugs ldan //
T02D1727:94a-2: g-yon brkyang mchog gis mi ro mnan cing mi bzad mchog gi gad rgyangs can //
T02D1727:94a-3: ral gri autpala gri gug thod pa 'dzin cing klu chen rgyan dang ldan //
T02D1727:94a-4: 'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud //
T02D1727:94a-5: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rab byas dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa //
T02D1727:94a-6: de yis 'gro ba ma lus rgyal ba'i bstan la
T02D1727:94a-7: mkhas par shog / de 'dir rtag pa'i rdo rjes
T02D1727:94a-8: blo 'phel sgrub thabs byas pa yis //
T02D1727:94a-9: zab mo la ni mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad rigs so //
T02D1727:94a-10: 'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba //
T02D1727:94a-11: slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1727:94a-13: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi panti ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas dang /
